glv::DataModel Class Reference

Proxy Data object for signalling state changes. More...

#include <glv_model.h>

Inheritance diagram for glv::DataModel:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Proxy Data object for signalling state changes.

This permits a user-defined action to be performed when any of the data values change.
